name: Explorations
description: [center]Explore areas for rewards. Exploration requires different skills and higher skill level results in faster exploration.[/center]

grasslands.name: Grasslands
grasslands.description: The area outside the city of Eldoria, an open grassy field filled with monsters.

shaded_woods.name: Shaded Woods
shaded_woods.description: A forest filled with glowing trees to the north of Eldora.

ancient_crypt.name: Ancient Crypt
ancient_crypt.description: An old dilapidated crypt in the middle of the Shaded Woods. It reeks of an aura of death and you feel that you shouldn't stick around for long.

magic_research.name: Magic Research
magic_research.description: After defeating the necromancer, the aura of death has diminished greatly. You look around his chambers and see a book on a pedestal and felt attracted to it. You feel compelled to read the book and understand it.

blue_sea.name: Blue Sea
blue_sea.description: Your great service towards Eldoria is greatly appreciated by the King and thus offered you a place to take a break.

eldorian_tournament.name: Eldorian Tournament
eldorian_tournament.description: A tournament is being held to find out who is the strongest in all of Eldoria! With your accomplishments and deeds, you were cordially invited to participate. Show off your strength to everyone!

dark_light.name: Dark Light
dark_light.description: A dark light is seen in the sky

hall_of_heroes.name: Hall of Heroes
hall_of_heroes.description: The hall where the souls of the old heroes rest.

dark_sea.name: Dark Sea
dark_sea.description: The forbidden sea of the ancient ones
